accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply to personally identifiable records pertaining to human resources and personnel in Box 52.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the University Librarian, Accession #RG-12/1/1.031, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The papers contain correspondence, reports, minutes, memoranda and printed material re the University of Virginia Library, staff and collections. During the time span of these papers Jack Dalton (1950-1956), John Cook Wyllie (1956- 1968), Ray Frantz (1968-1993) and Karin Wittenborg (1994- ) held the position of University Librarian. Topics in the subject files include the American Library Association; the Associates of the University of Virginia Library, the Association of Research Libraries, the Association of Southeastern Research Libraries, the Bibliographic Society of the University of Virginia, capital outlay, Clemons Library, collection development, computing activities, Directors' Council, emergency procedures, faculty procedures and research, goals, HEW statistics and Title II, human resources, insurance, library hours, the McGregor Library, networks, payroll, personnel, physical plant, preservation, publications, safety and security, SCHEV, Solinet, space projections, storage center, travel and Virginia State University.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: Series I. Subject files, Boxes 1-38. Series II. Library gift files, Boxes 39-51. Series III. Restricted files. Box 52.
